text: The Lapland Week () is a major annual conference. It is held by the Swedish Pentecostal Movement. It occurs in June-July every year in Husbondliden in Lycksele Municipality in Sweden. It was first held in 1919 as a Bible studies week. The event is one of the larger Christian festivals in northern Sweden. == References == ==Other websites== *webbplats Category:1919 establishments in Sweden Category:Protestantism in Sweden
title: Lapland Week
